title: Boy

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: The face of a boy, smiling. Differentiated from the man emoji on AndroidÂ by wearing a cap, and on iOS by the lack ofÂ any facial hair.Â It is  http://emojipedia.org/boy/
emoji_net_data.name: boy

bn:00104589a: In the early part of life or growth.
In the early part of growth or life; born not long ago.
(used of living things especially persons) in an early period of life or development or growth
In the early part of growth or life.

bn:00099604a: Of or pertaining to a young child; childlike

bn:00106354a: Of, relating to, or denoting a member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation

bn:00012569n: A boy is a young male human, usually child or adolescent.
A young male person, usually a child or teenager.
A young male human; a male child or young adult.

bn:00052968n: Determined sex of an animal. Use Q6581097 for a male human
A member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A person who belongs to the sex that cannot have babies
A male organism is the physiological sex which produces sperm.
An animal of the sex that has testes.

bn:00001480n: A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity
A teenager; a juvenile after puberty.
A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.

bn:00058715n: An animal or plant's progeny, an animal or plant's young.
Singular offspring, animal's or plant's progeny.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: The boy emoji on Apple devices depicts a young child with a friendly, open expression, often shown with neatly styled hair and wearing simple, modern clothing in muted tones.  Apple's design language imbues this emoji with soft, rounded edges and a subtle 3D effect, creating a sense of youthful innocence and approachability.  It's commonly used to represent childhood, family, or to refer to a young male in digital communication on Apple devices.
